pullrequest.title: Allow specifying physics engine in sdf file

content.raw: Yes, I think we can leave the switching between engines for the future, but I think it'd still be a good idea to use a vector of `sdf::Physics` so that we don't have to go through a deprecation process for the component. For now it could be a vector which with one element. If doing this requires too much change in the code, then feel free to ignore this suggestion.
content.html: Yes, I think we can leave the switching between engines for the future, but I think it'd still be a good idea to use a vector of sdf::Physics so that we don't have to go through a deprecation process for the component. For now it could be a vector which with one element. If doing this requires too much change in the code, then feel free to ignore this suggestion.
